```{r}
boot_out <- tsbs( 
  x = rnorm(50),
  n_boot = 100L,
  block_length = NULL,
  type = "moving",
  num_blocks = NULL,
  num_boots = 10L,
  func = mean,
  apply_func_to = "cols",
  p_method = "cross validation",
  p = NULL,
  overlap = TRUE,
  ar_order = 1,
  num_states = 2,
  model_func = default_model_func,
  score_func = mse     
)

str(boot_out)
```


```{r}
set.seed(42)
x <- arima.sim(n = 100, list(ar = 0.8))
result <- tsbs(
  x = x,
  n_boot = 100L,
  block_length = 10,
  bs_type = "stationary",
  block_type = "tapered",
  taper_type = "tukey",
  tukey_alpha = 0.2,
  num_blocks = 5,
  num_boots = 100L,
  func = mean,
  apply_func_to = "cols",
  p_method = "plugin",
  parallel = TRUE,
  num_cores = 2
)
print(result$func_out_means)
```
